titles.title: Ensuring State Attorney General Accountability Act
Ensuring State Attorney General Accountability Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prohibit 501(c)(3) organizations from providing direct funding to State attorneys general.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Ensuring State Attorney General Accountability Act
This bill prohibits a tax-exempt charitable organization from providing direct funding to state attorneys general for the purpose of a lawsuit, investigation, or remuneration of personnel.
